refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The Globus::GRAM::Error module defines symbolic names for the Error constants in the GRAM Protocol.
The Globus::GRAM::Error module methods return an object consisting of an integer erorr code, and (optionally) a string explaining the error.

listitem.para: Create a new error object with the given error number and string description. This is called by the error-specific factory methods described below.
Return the error string associated with a Globus::GRAM::Error object.
Return the integer error code associated with a Globus::GRAM::Error object.
